website_summaries.verdict: At first glance, this option seems pricey, but one 22.7 oz. tub yields up to 60 servings. Moreover, it delivers all the nutrition kids need for healthy growth in a natural formulation that's free of sugar and unnecessary additives.
pros: Doctor-developed formulation contains zero sugar, gluten, dyes, nuts, canola oil, soy oil, artificial colors, or synthetic flavors
Chock full of probiotics, protein, fiber, vitamins, and minerals to promote optimal growth and vitality
Great as a healthy snack or a meal replacement
cons: Children over the age of 3 require 2 scoops, cutting the number of servings in half
Some flavors are a bit hit and miss

customer_reviews.title: No returns- already opened product
customer_reviews.text: This was a great product for my child taste-wise bought from HEB on clearance. I just received this product after purchasing it from amazon for full price and it was not sealed. I could twist off the lid without opening the plastic around it, and the safety seal across the top is already significantly opened as well. I went to send it back for a new one but there are no returns. This makes me very dissatisfied with the seller, as I am not comfortable giving this to my child amd have just wasted good money.
customer_reviews.author: Jamie

customer_reviews.title: It has a good boost of vitamins and the flavor is actually pretty ...
customer_reviews.text: Fairly misleading. On the front it says up to 32 serving sizes... on the nutrition label, it shows 16 servings at 2 scoops each for a total of 90 calories and claims to be a total meal replacement for kids. How on Earth is a child supposed to survive on 90 calorie meals? And if you want it to last 32 servings, that cuts it to 45 calories per. It has a good boost of vitamins and the flavor is actually pretty nice but I needed something to help my little guy gain more weight, especially because he has lots of food allergies and eoe. This just won't cut it.
customer_reviews.author: Beautiful Pirate

customer_reviews.title: Reassuring drink, mixes poorly.
customer_reviews.text: This stuff gives me a little sense of peace. My son is a very picky eater and I have a difficult time getting him to eat anything that’s not spaghetti. He will drink the strawberry flavor, he hates the chocolate one, and I’m going to try the orange one. I wish there was a sample pack for all of the flavors. The downside to this is like others have said, it mixes terribly. I have to mix it with very hot water to dissolve it, then I add ice and regular milk. Even blending it with something cold right, it doesn’t mix well. It has to be hot to make it mix.
customer_reviews.author: candicelynn86

customer_reviews.title: Tasty vegan chocolate shakes
customer_reviews.text: Love KidzShake! I like that there is a vegan option that is made with pea, hemp and pumpkin protein. I don’t use this as a meal replacement but an addition. My kids eat like birds and I’m constantly worrying about their nutritional intake. Sometimes I serve this just as chocolate milk and sometimes as a shake and sneak some spinach and other healthy things in. When my kid’s friends come over they always ask for a shake and I feel good about giving them a KidzShake instead of fruit snacks or a million fish crackers. I also have the vanilla and strawberry flavors and my kids love having “pink milk” and vanilla milkshakes.
customer_reviews.author: SirKipling

customer_reviews.title: Kid and mom approved!
customer_reviews.text: My toddler loves this stuff, and I love that I can have him drink this daily to combat his finicky tastes and to ensure he gets the nutrients he needs. My three year old asks me to make him a shake with this multiple times a day. The only downside is that it is really hard to mix in. You can't just shake it in a sippy cup with the liquid, you have to actually use a blender or something to get it all blended well. Small price to pay, though, for such a healthy drink that my kid actually begs to drink!
customer_reviews.author: Kari K.

customer_reviews.title: It contains stevia.
customer_reviews.text: Tastes sweet but delicious! I also liked the product is easy to digest by my 5 year old who can get constipated from time to time. Most ingredients are listed as organic which is also great. My only concern is the stevia content. Make sure you read the label and check with your pediatrician if this is the best choice for your child.
customer_reviews.author: Jsf1313

customer_reviews.title: Great shake! Tastes great!
customer_reviews.text: The tub is smaller than I imagined for the price. However, the taste is good enough for my picky daughter to actually drink. I only use one scoop for her instead of two but she really likes it. I freeeeaked out when I saw the milk protein warning but there is nothing that would have milk in the ingredients and after reading reviews I believe that was a printing error. My daughter hasn't had any bad reactions towards it. I just wanted to something to supplement b12 more in her diet. She can not take supplements bc they give her mouth ulcers but this has been really good for her so far.
customer_reviews.author: Jen

customer_reviews.title: My kids LOVE the Vanilla Cream!
customer_reviews.text: My kids love this stuff! I mix each of theirs with 1/2 a banana, 2 ice cubs, and almond milk. Blend it with my ninja cup and it thickens and foams like a milkshake. It’s soooo good! One of the best tastes for a protein shake that we’ve tried. Our toddler is super picky and doesn’t eat much, and this is something he loves. My only wish is that there was a vegan option in the Vanilla Cream. I have yet to try the Chocolate Vegan KidzShake but am adding it to my cart now to try.
customer_reviews.author: pistol007

customer_reviews.title: Awful Taste
customer_reviews.text: My 4 year old absolutely hated this. I tried every which way to disguise it! I put in milkshakes, smoothies, cereal and even ice cream and she could still taste it! I eventually tried it myself and I have to admit it really did taste bad. I REALLY wanted to like this because it’s so full of nutrition and good things but it just tasted awful. Now I’m stuck with a pretty much full container of it just sitting in my cabinet.
customer_reviews.author: TB

customer_reviews.title: Not terrible - not great
customer_reviews.text: My daughter swore that this was the best thing ever, and begged me to order her some. She had it at a friend's house and was supposed to replace a meal or snack as she's trying to eat healthier. She had one or two glasses and said it tasted just like my shakes (I use HMR shakes for medical weight loss) and nothing that kept her interest. It isn't horrible, but nothing special. It's good to have for a quick breakfast when you are in a hurry, but I wouldn't say it is outstanding. Those instant breakfast drinks do about the same thing.
customer_reviews.author: Madladluc

customer_reviews.title: Not my kind of shake
customer_reviews.text: I was so excited to try this as my daughter is an incredibly picky eater. I thought for sure she would love a chocolate shake. Sadly, she hated it and it really doesn’t taste like a chocolate shake, unless you add cocoa powder, which I did. There may not be sugar in this, but there is something that makes it have a terrible artificially sweet flavor. Super bummed I’m left with an entire container of this. Wish we loved it.
customer_reviews.author: Jpg12

customer_reviews.title: Hard to mix
customer_reviews.text: Its ok. My kids drink it but don't necessarily care for it. We got chocolate. Its very, very, very hard to mix unless done in a blender and even then, it's foamy making it harder to drink. So my kids drink it with a straw if made in the blender to bypass the foamy surface. For extra calories, I make it with milk.
customer_reviews.author: Dee Jay

customer_reviews.title: Buy it
customer_reviews.text: Must purchase I need to order more it's time. It mixes with fruit smoothies. What ever I use this compliments the taste doesn't control the flavor. My child is 100% picky eater. At first she refused said it taste yucky! Now she begs for it! Smoothies that we make consist of yogurt banana blueberries strawberries orange juice apple grapes yogurt. We mix these all up or some of them ot only 3 of them and with the powder it tastes great.
customer_reviews.author: chaz

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: I have a child on the autism spectrum who is very picky. I have tried a lot of different supplements. This supplement is one of the best. Don’t let the small container fool you the manufacturer is smart to pack it full sign 16 servings. Many other products have a larger container but are not all full. I’m very happy with this product!!
customer_reviews.author: Kelli

customer_reviews.title: BEST nutritional powerhouse (and ahhhmazing taste!)
customer_reviews.text: First of all, I use Kidzshake every.single.day. It's SO GOOD! Kidzshake is my absolute favorite nutrition/protein powder! With real, clean ingredients, ZERO grams of added sugar, probiotics, fiber, vitamins, minerals and enzymes, what could be better? And the flavors are SO GOOD! They taste amazing. You can incorporate Kidzshake in so many recipes, from muffins, bars, cookies and energy bites, to smoothies and smoothie bowls. One of my favorite ways to use the chocolate Kidzshake vegan is in yogurt! (Tastes like chocolate pudding!) Kidzshake is just a wonderful multivitamin that is also gluten, soy and nut-free. It's delicious AND nutritious! If you haven't bought Kidzshake, I highly recommend it! You and your whole family will love it. :)
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: My kids love it
customer_reviews.text: I'm lazy and have picky kids, so I have a weekly breakfast menu. This has quickly become one of our staples. My kids love a shake in the morning with some peanut butter toast and some fruit. It is quick and easy and I feel good about the nutrients they are getting. My super picky eater drinks this and loves it.
customer_reviews.author: addictedtoamazon

customer_reviews.title: Tastes like a top notch protein shake but better
customer_reviews.text: Delicious and creamy. I used to buy a protein shake from Nuskin because of the taste and the superfoods in it but Kidzshake plus contains the same super foods, tastes as good (if not better) and is a fourth of the cost. I looked at some of the reviews saying how awful it is but I can’t see (or taste) what they’re saying. I love it, my son loves it, a great buy overall to replace chocolate and strawberry milk that are full of high fructose corn syrup.
customer_reviews.author: Drew M

customer_reviews.title: Best result ever!
customer_reviews.text: I came upon this product thanks to my sister, I had explained to her how I was a bit worried about my son weight that I am looking for shakes or bars or something to help him gain a bit of weight and she had brought up kidzshake along with others brands that she has tried for her 2 year son so of course I did my research and I decided to give kidzshake a go because they share multiple recipes which I love because I have a picky taster and I have tried their blueberry banana, strawberry banana and pineapple berry smoothie recipes and he absolutely enjoys drinking them! So don’t hesitate your kid will enjoy!
customer_reviews.author: Annie Mendiola

customer_reviews.title: Better nutrition and better ingredients for kiddos
customer_reviews.text: My toddler is so picky about food. She basically lives off fruit, chicken nuggets, and bacon. This has been a great way to sneak veggies into her diet. She loves the taste of the chocolate cream. (She's a girl after my own heart.) It has fantastic ingredients. Nothing nasty and nothing to worry about if your kiddo has allergies. I would definitely recommend if you're worried your little one isn't getting all they need from their diet.
customer_reviews.author: Lacy

customer_reviews.title: Lots of ideas for how to get kids their nutrients on the kidzshake blog
customer_reviews.text: My 3 year old used to be a great eater but she’s going through a picky stage lately. So I bought this chocolate shake for her just to fill the gaps in her diet since it seemed like a better option than pediasure. Well she didn’t like it. Personally, I think it tastes great but she won’t touch it. I ended up using it to make popsicles from a recipe on the kidzshake blog and that’s been working for us! I love that kidzshake has lots of ways to use the shake
customer_reviews.author: Rachael Hampton

customer_reviews.title: My 2 years old love it
customer_reviews.text: My daughter doesn't eat much which makes me very worry about. I'm trying my best to add the nutrition she needs in the drinks she loves. I'm so happy that she loves the taste of KidzShake Strawberry Plus. It mixes and blends very well in milk. I haven't tried it with anything else other than milk. So far so good. I've been using Kidzshake everyday for a week now. My daughter is excited everytime I make her a cup. It doesn't smell very strong, it smells delightful and I love that about it. It tastes very natural too. Highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Anh

customer_reviews.title: Bait and switch
customer_reviews.text: I bought the original vanilla mix preciously ago and my picky daughter loved it. It was lactose free and didn’t upset her tummy. Reordered and the ingredients have totally changed! No longer lactose free and the taste is terrible. I just opened the new one when the old one ran out and now it’s too late to return. KIDZ - you need to update the info on the website and say new formula.
customer_reviews.author: ST

customer_reviews.title: Too expensive for the amount that you get.
customer_reviews.text: My kids love this protein powder however I feel that both sizes are overpriced.. this costs almost $45 and between two kids it's already almost gone and I've only had it for a couple of days.. these containers are only filled 1/2 to 3/4 of the way.. for the price they should be filled right to the top.. as much as my kids enjoy this I will be looking for another protein source.. it's just too expensive.
customer_reviews.author: nichole walters

customer_reviews.title: Horrible. Beware- No returns.
customer_reviews.text: Tastes horrible. Couldn’t even get the bad flavor hidden by blending it with fruit and almond milk to make a smoothie. And no returns...even though item description says, “OUR GUARANTEE | Even the pickiest eaters love Kidzshake - However if your child doesn't love it for any reason, we'll refund your purchase without any questions asked”
customer_reviews.author: Felicia Rolon

customer_reviews.title: Disappointment
customer_reviews.text: I had high hopes for this product based on reviews and nutrition content. However, neither of my kids like this shake. (Ages 13 and 8). They both said it's terrible and won't drink it. I now have a full can of product that will go to waste along with money I can't get back because of the zero return policy (which I'll pay closer attention to in the future).
customer_reviews.author: free

customer_reviews.title: Can't go without it!
customer_reviews.text: Our son who is a very very picky eater has been drinking this for about a year. Without it, we see a definite change in his behavior. It helps increase his appetite too! It is expensive and doesn't last long so we use only one scoop in about 8 ounces of almond milk. He loves the taste, has refused other brands.
customer_reviews.author: Family of 9

customer_reviews.title: Love this product!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter is a very picky eater. She used to eat all her vegetables and anything I put in front of her, until she turned 2. I give her a shake every morning - 1-2 scoops with milk. Once in a while she'll get a shake "like mommy" where I throw it in a blender with fruits and veggies. She loves the product and always asks "for the powder" in the morning! Another reason I bought this product was because of the probiotics. Since birth she's always gone irregular but this has really helped her go more regularly.
customer_reviews.author: Frances Vicari

customer_reviews.title: Tree Nut Allergy Alert! Says on box I got not as advertised
customer_reviews.text: the reason for the 3 stars...my oldest son has an allergy to tree nuts. The article and pictures never showed anywhere about this product being made in a facility that may contain tree nuts. When I received the package, it read on the side that it was....with no returns available. Luckily my other son does not and was able to use it.
customer_reviews.author: Chris & Michelle Slaughter

customer_reviews.title: Did not like the taste!
customer_reviews.text: I thought on a healthy shake for my little one (who’s 3 years old) but unfortunately she did not like the taste. I ordered strawberry and chocolate and she did no like either flavor. I tried it and it tastes like a diet shake powder. I’ve have tried adding some fruit, but no luck at all. Since seller do not accept returns I guess I’m stuck with it.
customer_reviews.author: Ana

customer_reviews.title: Probably won't purchase again.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my son and he seems to like it. He says the flavor isn't that good but it isn't that bad either. I tried a sip of it and I don't like it... I think it has a medicine taste to it... But he's been drinking it. I'm not sure if I'll purchase it again as it is a bit pricy. I'll keep looking around for something better tasting and more affordable.
customer_reviews.author: R L C

customer_reviews.title: My super picky kids LOVE this!
customer_reviews.text: Finally, a HEALTHY breakfast option, that my children love to drink! My kids are super picky, and I worried about them getting enough quality protein and nutrients. We’ve tried other healthy protein shakes (and some not so healthy), but my kids didn’t like them, or I worried about some of the ingredients in those products. We bought the chocolate kidzshake, and I’m thrilled that my kids love the taste, and it’s completely healthy for them. They really enjoy blending it with milk and frozen bananas. So delicious!!!
customer_reviews.author: Jamie M. Woodle

customer_reviews.title: Don’t get the “plus” - so gross
customer_reviews.text: Nothing like the original vanilla. My 2 year old used to drink this every night before bed. He’s a skinny picky eater and I needed a little extra something to feel like he was getting what he needed. He refuses the new “plus” flavor. It smells funny. Mixes poorly. And he wants nothing to do with it. Don’t get the plus. So gross.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren

customer_reviews.title: Kiddo loves it
customer_reviews.text: We haven't been using it long but so far my kiddo loves. We do use chocolate almond milk and occasionally add fruit. I made it once using the exact amount of almond milk the instructions said, and my daughter did not like it. However when I add 2 additional ounces of chocolate almond milk she loved it. So definitely play around with it.
customer_reviews.author: YeahYeah

customer_reviews.title: I can not say enough good things about this
customer_reviews.text: I can not say enough good things about this! My very picky eater, who also has peanut/tree nut allergies, LOVEs this!!! I am so glad to have found good, quality, protein shake that is safe for him and he loves the flavor! Not only that, but the customer service is amazing. I had a question about the ingredients, reached out to them, and got a return phone call, so soon, with more information than I could have wished for.
customer_reviews.author: Brittney

customer_reviews.title: Adding a banana to the shake was a good move too
customer_reviews.text: My 3 yo loves it blended with ice and not so much bmixed with milk or cold water. Adding a banana to the shake was a good move too. Now she loves her chocolate-banana shake! I drink it straight up with cold water. It makes me feel great, frankly. My husband refuses to try, though if he felt the benefits he would be on it every day! Awesome product, wish it was less expensive however.
customer_reviews.author: magnum

customer_reviews.title: My child did not like this shake
customer_reviews.text: My child did not like this shake, it was too gritty and the flavor was not desirable. I used my Ninja blender to try to make it to Tolerable and no luck. I tried to make it with milk, and with milk with ice and even added a little chocolate syrup. Needless to say I will not purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Picky kids actually drink it
customer_reviews.text: Mixed equal parts powder and chocolate almond milk, once a paste forms, add the rest of your almond milk. Kids actually like this stuff!
customer_reviews.author: J T

customer_reviews.title: Clumpy with a spoon
customer_reviews.text: There’s a reason why the instructions say mix with a blender. The container we got a year ago is still pretty full. It’s inconvenient that this gets all clumpy and gross when stirred with a spoon. I don’t want to use or clean my blender every day.
customer_reviews.author: Alba

customer_reviews.title: My daughter loves it
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves this. I mix it with organic almond milk and maybe a little water. She literally asks me for it specifically and she is not even 2 years old yet. A bit pricey but well worth the buy
customer_reviews.author: BScott

customer_reviews.title: Tastes good but kids won't drink
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to replace pediasure for my toddlers. Personally I think this stuff tastes pretty good. Can't get my twins to drink it though. Also if you leave this stuff mixed in a cup overnight, it pretty much solidifies into the shape of the containers. Because I have a weird sense of humor, I gave it an extra star.
customer_reviews.author: Brianna Cowles

customer_reviews.title: Over priced and 10 year old didn’t like flavor
customer_reviews.text: I read good review so I thought why not try it . I was surprised with how small it was when it arrived . I added vanilla almond milk , ice and banana and my daughter said it taste like goat milk lol whatever that means . It didn’t mix well and I feel ripped off now . I would not recommend this !!!
customer_reviews.author: Denise

customer_reviews.title: My picky eater loves this smoothie.
customer_reviews.text: I swear by this product for my little one. She is 3 and very picky with her food. I make her a banana smoothie everyday and add a spoonful of this in it. She gulps it down. I have also noticed that on those days that I don't give her this smoothie, her cheeks looks smaller ie losing weight. So this definitely provides the wholesome nutrition kids need to keep them healthy and strong. Thank you for creating such a wonderful product for picky children!
customer_reviews.author: MH

customer_reviews.title: Using it for more than a year now
customer_reviews.text: We have been using this for more than a year now and it has added extra nutrition to milk. My kids love it and they want it every time, though my wife has limited it to once in a day and that's because they should learn to drink without it also. But overall am very satisfied with the product.
customer_reviews.author: Abhi

customer_reviews.title: Allergy Warnings:  Nuts
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for my grandson, low and behold when it arrived I read the back and towards the bottom it says “Allergy Warning: nuts.” My grandson has a nut allergy and couldn’t use this. When you look at product on website in all the pictures you don’t see this and it should be there for cases like this. See pictures.
customer_reviews.author: Yolanda Rivera

customer_reviews.title: Great taste. Use less than recommended serving
customer_reviews.text: My son is 9, he has never been interested in breakfast food. This is a nice alternative. The taste is great too. However be careful using the recommended serving. Introduce it slowly. Too much protein at once made my some stomach very sick. I cut back on the amount , and he enjoys it very much.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It's Healthy and has quality ingredients.
customer_reviews.text: I like that this is a healthy option for a kids shake with quality ingredients. It's tastes malty more than chocolate. It's a bit pricey, but I guess most of these shakes are.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa  Coakley

customer_reviews.title: Buy the chocolate!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Yall. Buy this!! Simply amazing. My 5 and 3 year olds love their new "chocolate milk" and gulp it down in minutes! It makes me feel much better knowing they are getting in some necessary nutrients.
customer_reviews.author: Red

customer_reviews.title: I liked it and my little girl likes it too
customer_reviews.text: I liked it and my little girl likes it too. It mixes very well if you add a little bit of cold water, milk or coconut water and once mixed then you complete with more of hot or cold drink. I usually just use one scoop for each bottle (one in the morning and one at night) just so she isn’t too full to eat different things.
customer_reviews.author: Kanan

customer_reviews.title: Picky eater needs this nutrition
customer_reviews.text: My toddler has texture issues with many foods and is an extremely picky eater. Putting this in his smoothie in the morning eases my panicked mind about him getting enough vitamins and such. He LOVES the vanilla and chocolate flavor. I am so grateful I can confidently give this to my kids without fear of toxic ingredients and masses of sugar. The quest to expand the food horizons of the picky eater continues, but I’m a little more relaxed about the gaps in nutrition now.
customer_reviews.author: Brenda B

customer_reviews.title: Good for Picky Toddlers
customer_reviews.text: i mix this in with a little ice cream shake and my kid loves it. adds a little more nutrition to the shake and great way to get those picky young toddlers to get the nutrition they need.
customer_reviews.author: Hien

customer_reviews.title: Great to taste, terrible on the billfold
customer_reviews.text: Taste is great. My picky daughter thinks it tastes like a milkshake, but it is terribly expensive. It will be gone in a week. Way too much money for what you get. But if you have the money to shell out, your kids will probably love it.
customer_reviews.author: Julie B

customer_reviews.title: My kids prefer healthy heigh shake mix
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this product because I like it having a bit better nutrients than the "healthy height." I was a long time buyer of healthy height but thought I would try this to see if better nutrients also had better taste and value. The healthy height is a better value in regards to size and price. My kids still prefer healthy height and are upset that this shake mix gets really thick really quickly. They do not want to drink it. Unfortunately this was not a successful transition.
customer_reviews.author: Stacia

customer_reviews.title: I love that it’s vegan 🌱 😍😍😍
customer_reviews.text: So first of all, I’ve a very very picky 5 years old and she gives me hard time always anything related to food so I’m always worried she don’t get all the nutrition she needs! When I came over kidzshake on Instagram and I saw they use clean and natural ingredients I fell in love! My daughter thinks she is having milk shake everyday and she is excited about it so it’s a win win. And let’s not forget about there is vegan option!!! I’m so happy to find something yummy my daughter would like! Definitely going to purchase more!
customer_reviews.author: lulet germa

customer_reviews.title: Flavor doesn't work for my kids...
customer_reviews.text: I wanted this for nutrition between all the running and activities. Really tastes like a processed health food shake. I can't even hide it from them in real chocolate milk or get them to drink it with ice cream in it. They do way better eating spinach and other fresh vegetables and fruit. ☹️
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Marrinan

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: I started buying these for my son a few years ago to supplement his not-so-great eating habits (very picky). It mixes well unlike some powders where you still have little pieces floating around. This was great for him, because he struggles with textures. I especially like giving it to him during sports seasons to get some extra protein into him. He loves the taste and continues to drink it multiple times a week even a few years later.
customer_reviews.author: JuliaD3

customer_reviews.title: Excellent source of Protein for my toddler
customer_reviews.text: I have a very picky eater in my toddler. He barely eats anything at all throughout the day. I am so happy I found this shake. I add one spoon of this to a vegetable shake and he downs it.
customer_reviews.author: Shila

customer_reviews.title: Great for my kids
customer_reviews.text: I really love this. I have been looking for a shake replacement for my kids because they love them so much. This is awesome because it doesn’t have a bunch of added ingredients that can be harmful. And they also love the taste! The only thing I would like is if you could get more product for a lower price.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa G.

customer_reviews.title: Foamy overload with shaken with blender bottle
customer_reviews.text: I’m not sure if it’s the “Plus” ingredients but this formula creates much more foam when shaken up than the regular. Half the drink turns into a foamy texture and my kid doesn’t like drinking it, but he loved the regular one. It also doesn’t smell as good as the last. I wouldn’t get the plus again though I was happier with the ingredients.
customer_reviews.author: chloe

customer_reviews.title: Amazing alternative if your kid doesn't like pediasure or your ...
customer_reviews.text: My son loves to drinks this shakes. He is autistic so he basically lives from this. Amazing alternative if your kid doesn't like pediasure or your looking for a healthier alternative
customer_reviews.author: Yoyi

customer_reviews.title: Tastes great!
customer_reviews.text: We have been using this shake mix for over a year and my daughter loves it! We struggle to get her to eat, she just doesn't like to spend the time needed to eat a meal. We mix this shake with warm milk in the mornings and call it her Hot Chocolate. It mixes well and doesn't have a chalky flavor. The ingredients are tailored for healthy growth and I like that it contains omega-3. Disappointed that they took it off of the subscribe and save.
customer_reviews.author: Lynn Kendall

customer_reviews.title: Not the same taste as before
customer_reviews.text: My son has loved this kids shake the few past times I have got it. Unfortunately this time it testes a bit off. Not sure what's wrong but it tastes really bad. I wont be giving this to my son any longer.
customer_reviews.author: Helena A

customer_reviews.title: My picky eaters loved it!
customer_reviews.text: My kids are picky eaters so I'm always looking for healthy snacks and food they'll actually like. We tried Kidzshake and they loved it. They liked it best when we mixed it in a blender: no lumps. It did get a little foamy so let it sit for a minute. We haven't tried it with other mix-ins yet but adding fruit to it would make a great treat. The directions are simple and easy so kids can make this on their own. I love how quickly it came once I ordered and will definitely be trying more products!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not just for kidz
customer_reviews.text: I am trying every strawberry protein powder within budgetary means. I have tried several. This one is currently in 1st place. Really tastes great, and I haven’t been a kid since....well, a long time. Going to try other flavors too. Clean ingredients thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Sister Mary

customer_reviews.title: So glad I found this!
customer_reviews.text: I'm so glad I found this! My daughter had been drinking pediasure every morning (can't get her to eat breakfast!) and I've been wanting to find a healthier replacement, since pediasure is loaded with sugar and other crap ingredients. This stuff is so much healthier. It's got protein and the vitamins without the sugar, oils and processed stuff. And it tastes yummy!
customer_reviews.author: Jess Minopoli

customer_reviews.title: Bait and switch - Not as Advertised - Buyer beware!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the organic vanilla cream; I received the vanilla version. They have different ingredients and the vanilla has sugar in it whereas the vanilla cream does not. I cannot return! Buyer beware as they swap out types. You do not get what you purchase and for the price it is a terrible waste! I will not order from amazon again!
customer_reviews.author: RW

customer_reviews.title: Expensive.
customer_reviews.text: The ONLY thing I dislike is the pricetag! We are a one income family who desperately needs these shakes for our son who has some health problems and is refusing to eat several days a week. But this is so expensive! Taste is wonderful. My son loves it! I’m impressed with the ingredients. Good product. If you can afford it.
customer_reviews.author: AshleyHall

customer_reviews.title: Great protein shake pricey for older kids
customer_reviews.text: I bought the vanilla flavor. Very good tasting protein. My kid really likes it. Not a good value since use two scoops. I don’t like it that I need to use a blender.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: My little ones absolutely loved this protein powder
customer_reviews.text: My little ones absolutely loved this protein powder! They love getting creative with what extras they can add in and make a new mix. It makes me feel good knowing how many vitamins they’re getting and it satisfies them for those mornings when we have no time for breakfast because we need to get going. I will for sure continue to purchase this product.
customer_reviews.author: erikajas23

customer_reviews.title: Excelent for picky eaters
customer_reviews.text: We have THE PICKIEST 6 year old eater and he loves this shake. It is the first thing he. Asks for when he comes home from school. When we mix it it has the consistancy of milk so is not thick and icky as he says. We mix with orange juice and water for an orange Julius type drink or with chocolate or even strawberry to mix it up..we love it!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Aimee H.

customer_reviews.title: It's pretty pricey but it's worth it
customer_reviews.text: This is my second jar. It's pretty pricey but it's worth it. I've been searching for something I can give to my two kids for breakfast since it's really difficult to get them to eat anything in the morning. I'm so glad I found KidzShake since it's got all the vitamins and nutrients WITHOUT the sugar. Wish it becomes available in Subscribe and Save since I'm going through it every 2 months!
customer_reviews.author: teresa

customer_reviews.title: A great alternative to the sugary
customer_reviews.text: My son enjoys this shake but he is special needs and he favors Pediasure. I bought this to break the manotony of having a shake high in sugar. A great alternative to the sugary drinks
customer_reviews.author: HexaMama

customer_reviews.title: Taste gross
customer_reviews.text: My 3 year old hated this. I tasted it and it didn't have a good flavor at all! I drink protein shakes myself all the time. This has an awful flavor.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Chalky tasting
customer_reviews.text: Neither of my kids liked the flavor of this shake, so I tried it too... the after taste is the worst part, but the drink itself is chalky.
customer_reviews.author: Traci

customer_reviews.title: Healthy and Flavorful
customer_reviews.text: My kids love this stuff! I give it to them as a snack and they demolish it, it makes me feel good that I know they are getting healthy things in their diet and they love it too. Only complaint is that it is very small. For two children, it doesn't last long. I wish that the container would be bigger.
customer_reviews.author: Will

customer_reviews.title: I loved the vanilla
customer_reviews.text: small packaging but it lasts a while. I loved the vanilla, my daughter is very picky and wouldn't go near it but I think I could try different ways to get her to try it. I ended up using it myself, felt very full for a few after drinking it!
customer_reviews.author: Gina

customer_reviews.title: Quick protein packed breakfast shake
customer_reviews.text: My 10 yr old son loves these shakes. He doesn’t have the appetite for a good breakfast before school so he has one every week day morning. Since he drinks it in place of a meal, I combine with a cup of milk, 1 banana and two spoonfuls of almond butter and blend in my ninja. The taste is good, not great but he finds it very easy to drink.
customer_reviews.author: Maria

customer_reviews.title: Dissolves easily, tastes great!
customer_reviews.text: Both the 4 and the 2 year old approve! This is more expensive then most products but the ingredients and flavor are well worth it! Kids drink it happily.
customer_reviews.author: H. R. L.

customer_reviews.title: Not a crowd pleaser
customer_reviews.text: I couldn't get my kids to drink it. They did not like the flavor. Still sitting in my pantry :(
customer_reviews.author: Maisel

customer_reviews.title: My kids are super picky eaters and I feel like I finally have ...
customer_reviews.text: My kids are super picky eaters and I feel like I finally have a little protein that they can’t refuse! We made smoothies, milkshakes, etc everyday with this and they love it!
customer_reviews.author: pa

customer_reviews.title: Couldn’t get my son to drink it-
customer_reviews.text: This doesn’t taste very sweet and I have to add sweet fruits to it to get my son to drink it. We won’t buy this again.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Just great!!!
customer_reviews.text: My kids love it! I mix it with almond milk and spoon of veggie powder and it’s all they need to get their nutrition through the day!!
customer_reviews.author: madajka

customer_reviews.title: VEGAN
customer_reviews.text: This is a really good vegan chocolate shake. It tastes SO SO SO much better than the Orgain plant based chocolate shake. I didn't have any problem with the packaging/the product being opened when it was delivered to me. I also don't have any problems with mixing, blending or the shake texture. I mix my shake with soy milk or a coconut milk, in the blender (not a shaker bottle), and add a couple ice cubes.
customer_reviews.author: CCL

customer_reviews.title: Better than those high sugar meal replacements
customer_reviews.text: I love this shake for my toddler. I mix it with oatmeal and almond butter for a creamier taste. This shake helps when he feels picky with his food.
customer_reviews.author: Mario Icaza

customer_reviews.title: It is not the same flavor, taste different, my son won't drink it
customer_reviews.text: The taste is not good. I tried making it alone with milk and it does not taste good. I am not sure if it is this batch, but my son won't drink it and the worst is that I cannot return or request a refund for it.
customer_reviews.author: Dicacoba

customer_reviews.title: Kids love it
customer_reviews.text: I made this shake for my 3 & 5 year old and they loved it! Smells just like a packet of coco mix when opened and good chocolate taste! ( I tried some to)
customer_reviews.author: kaitlyn wiacek

customer_reviews.title: Back off the stevia.
customer_reviews.text: Very heavy stevia flavor. Another fail for my picky kid.
customer_reviews.author: MJMomma

customer_reviews.title: Love this shake!!
customer_reviews.text: My 5 and 2 year old LOVE this, and it keeps them full. I was looking for something for my son when he starts Kindergarten. He's kind of picky, so I was worried he'd be hungry. I added some fruit, a little yogurt, and they loved it!
customer_reviews.author: Valerie Jackson

customer_reviews.title: They love it. They prefer the chocolate and vanilla over ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for our children (ages 3 and 7). They love it. They prefer the chocolate and vanilla over the strawberry. Made in the USA- all good ingredients for children. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: K Sutton

customer_reviews.title: Great for kids but better for Moms!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter really loves her protein shakes. I love them because she is also getting all the vitamins she needs. It’s also very easy to make. I like to mix it in the blender because it mixes up better.
customer_reviews.author: Mick Morley

customer_reviews.title: It's good
customer_reviews.text: My son likes very much when it blended with strawberry and yogurt. Very good.
customer_reviews.author: John John

customer_reviews.title: Great-Grandson is a very picky eater. This helps a ...
customer_reviews.text: Great-Grandson is a very picky eater. This helps a lot. He loves it. My granddaughter buys it all the time. Thought I'd check to see if Amazon carried it. Found it, ordered it for her.
customer_reviews.author: PatRat

customer_reviews.title: Beware this is milk base protein powder
customer_reviews.text: I was not awared of that this protein powder is milk base, there is only one small print mentions contain milk protein. I was searching for plant base protein and it came up. My daughter is allergic to dairy, I wish they have printed dairy or milk base protein on the bottle.
customer_reviews.author: julie  lin

customer_reviews.title: Delicious!
customer_reviews.text: 4 year old who loves vanilla shakes has one on school mornings for extra energy and protein. Shake it up using a hand mixer bottle with a spoon of vanilla ice cream and water :)
customer_reviews.author: MB

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: My kids didn't care for it...ended up giving it to a friend that used it.
customer_reviews.author: luvbnmom

customer_reviews.title: Kids love it.
customer_reviews.text: Expensive is the only negative abt it. Kids ask for it every morning.
customer_reviews.author: T

customer_reviews.title: Toddler Approved
customer_reviews.text: My toddler is extremely picky but when it comes to his chocolate shakes as we say in the morning he absolutely love this. Makes me feel better knowing that he's getting good nutrition instead of some kind of junk sugarfield shake. Just found a yummy cookie recipe to make using this for an afterschool set snack extremely excited
customer_reviews.author: FarmFitMomma

customer_reviews.title: My picky eater won't touch it
customer_reviews.text: I got this since I have an extremely picky eater. She won't touch anything with this in it. It tastes much like any vanilla protein powder - made for kids or adults.
customer_reviews.author: AshleyA

customer_reviews.title: No more skipping breakfast!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter doesn’t skip breakfast anymore! She drinks this most days, and I’m so happy!
customer_reviews.author: Josie

customer_reviews.title: Great for picky kids
customer_reviews.text: My daughters love the taste, but it's a bit hard to mix. I usually use a blender bottle bc a spoon just won't do it.
customer_reviews.author: ErinR

customer_reviews.title: Taste is less than desirable
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately does not taste good at all! My daughter tried valiantly to like it, but couldn’t choke it down. I am editing this review because the manufacturer sent me an email asking about the product. I told them what I said above and they refunded me! Great customer service.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer R. Simco

product_meta.title: KidzShake - Kids Vanilla Cream Organic Protein Powder | Nutritional Meal Replacement Shake - Non GMO, Gluten Free, & Complete Multivitamin w/ Probiotics, 22.75 oz
feature_bullets: PREMIUM NUTRITION MADE EASY | Add healthy calories to your kids diet with an all natural meal replacement that is easy to consume and tastes great
ALL-IN-ONE NUTRITION | Each bottle contains 16 servings of protein, complete multivitamin, probiotics, omega-3s, digestive enzymes, and fiber
NO HARMFUL INGREDIENTS | All Natural, Non GMO, No Fillers, Preservatives, Dyes, Gluten, Nuts, HFCS - this way your kids will get the best ingredients to help them grow and stay healthy
DOCTOR DEVELOPED | Formulated to support a healthy immune system, support brain function & concentration, aid in proper digestion & contribute to stronger bones
OUR GUARANTEE | Even the pickiest eaters love Kidzshake - However if your child doesn't love it for any reason, we'll refund your purchase without any questions asked
